configure.name: MAVLINK_PORT
configure.description: The port device to use for mavlink

configure.name: MAVLINK_BAUD
configure.description: Baud rate if MAVLINK_PORT is a UART

makefile.raw: MAVLINK_PORT ?= UART1 MAVLINK_BAUD ?= B57600 MAVLINK_PORT_LOWER=$(shell echo $(MAVLINK_PORT) | tr A-Z a-z) MAVLINK_PORT_UPPER=$(shell echo $(MAVLINK_PORT) | tr a-z A-Z) ifeq ($(MAVLINK_PORT), UsbS) ap.CFLAGS += -DUSE_USB_SERIAL ap.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/usb_ser_hw.c ap.CFLAGS += -DMAVLINK_DEV=UsbS else ap.CFLAGS += -DMAVLINK_DEV=$(MAVLINK_PORT_UPPER) ap.CFLAGS += -DUSE_$(MAVLINK_PORT_UPPER) ap.CFLAGS += -D$(MAVLINK_PORT_UPPER)_BAUD=$(MAVLINK_BAUD) endif
